name: Near miss snake
description:
I wanted to make a snake game for a while and now I had a good idea for proper snake game architecture and also I made vanilla snake game and released source for it (next to this project's source). 

This is not your ordinary snake, although I wanted to keep vanilla arcade feel. In this version you need to work for it to feed the snake.

Initial game was made in 2h together with vanilla snake, but had problems finding way to colorize game like I wanted and that took me 2h. So instead of intended 3h I spent 4+ hours but it was worth it. I hope you'll enjoy challenging snake game.

Source - https://github.com/nezvers/Godot_jam_games_3.1/tree/master/Trijam%20-%20Near%20Miss%20Snake

Youtube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCb4-Y0E6mmwjtawcitIAzKQ

Twitter - https://twitter.com/NeZversStudio
